amendment.description: To provide funds to enhance harmful algal bloom exposure activities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3853 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3853 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5902-5903; text: CR S5902-5903) To provide funds to enhance harmful algal bloom exposure activities.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3853 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 3695.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3853 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
